overview: Collection of four short films from Falcon Studios. "Workmen's Compensation" (a.k.a. "Sex Extravaganza," "Bill Ellis And Friend," "Bob Ellis And Friend," "Bill Ells," "'Big' Bill Eld And Friend") — Superstud Bill Eld claims he's never fucked a man's ass before, but his partner in this film really knows how to take every inch of that wrist-thick prick, and Bill plows home! "I Want Something Big" — What Jimmy Hughes and Ray Todd do to willing young Donny is not to be believed! "Come 'N Leather" — On huge boulders with a little waterfall, Jack takes on a curly brunet, a blonde guy and a black shoulder-to-crotch harness with leather dildo. "Back Seat Affair" (a.k.a. "First Taste of Sin," "Hitchhiker") — A trick in a military jacket, plaid shirt and high-water bell-bottoms strikes a silly pose along the road. A car stops and a back seat rider gets out, inviting the hitchhiker for a ride.
title: Workmen's Compensation
